Text:
Israel is forcing wounded persons, patients, doctors, people seeking shelter to evacuate Kamal Adwan hospital. This comes after Israeli forces have spent weeks shelling and bombing the hospital.

Whoever needs to make the call to order this to stop. 

Make it.
An Israeli air strike has targeted the broadcasting vehicle of Quds News Network, killing five Palestinian journalists in front of the al-Awda Hospital in central Gaza

Israel bombed Tulkarem refugee camp north of the West Bank again. 

Since the morning at least five killed in Tulkarem, and at least 11 injured. Israeli forces are conducting airstrikes and sniping people down.

Israel is using suicide robots in the attack on Kamal Adwan hospital in Gaza.

Yall Palestinians are literally fighting an apocalypse against machines. It’s so dystopian.
In the last two weeks the Palestinian Authority has arrested at least 41 Palestinians in Jenin, including wounded persons in an operation dubbed “Operation protect home”

Iron Dome fails to intercept a rocket fired from Yemen moments ago.

It hit Tel Aviv.

وين ولادي؟

With Al-Louh’s death, the number of journalists killed by Israel since the start of the genocide has reached 200.

1 9 7.

Destruction.
